content: प्रदृश् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To see, behold. {@--2@} To look at, regard. {@--3@} To foresee. {@--4@} To observe, perceive, discern. {@--5@} To be intelligent. {@--6@} To think, have an opinion. {@--7@} To look at, look upon. {%--<ab>Pass.</ab>%} {@--1@} To become visible. {@--2@} To look, appear. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To show, point out, discover, exhibit. {@--2@} To make clear, prove, demonstrate, explain.
